title: prAkrta janulatO
sahitya:
prAkrta janulatO bhASimpucunu broddu pArakoTTu koNTigA konnALLu 
shrI krSNa nI pAda sEvakuDani pEru jendaka tirigitigA innALLu


anupallavi



caraNam 1    poTTasAkuTaku bhUpAla kula nEnu pogaDu tirigitigA konnALLu 
iSTa varamuliccu I cuDavani ninnu eruga nEranaitigA innALLu
    caraNam 2    krUramaina samsAramandu jocci kovvucu tirigitigA konnALLu 
sAramaina nI nAma smaraNa jEsi nEmi sAmIpyamu jEriti innALLu
    caraNam 3    anya bhAmalapai AsamIra nEnu hausukha tirigitigA konnALLu 
pannaga shayanA nannu brOvumani paluka nEranaitigA innALLu
    caraNam 4    mancivArala dUSinci vArendani encucu tirigitigA konnALLu 
sancita karmamu trnci brOvumani cAla nammu koNTinu innALLu
    caraNam 5    IlAgu pApamu lennennO cEyucu nilanu tirigitini konnALLu 
vAlAyamu ninnu varNimpucumu nEnu vAramu pUjinciti innALLu
    caraNam 6    pApAtmula EdabAyaka nEnu pAmaruDaiyuNtini konnALLu 
gOpAladAsuniyE pATiyai nAnu kApADumani vEDiti innALLu
